Commentary: Sohail Tanvir to Babar Azam, no run, good length outside off, driven on the up to Baz at mid-off. Gayle was sent back. They've taken on his arm and he's hit it direct. Third umpire...will rule not out. He's grounded his bat nicely
Sohail Tanvir to Babar Azam, 1 run, good length on the pads, glanced to short fine
Sohail Tanvir to Gayle, no run, fires in a yorker at leg stump, uses his reach to convert it into a yorker to jam it to short fine
Sohail Tanvir to Gayle, no run, back of a length outside off, leaves it alone

Sohail Tanvir to Gayle, no run, 127 kph, good length at middle stump, very slight deviation away. Goes forward and pushes it to point who shies and breaks the stumps at the non-strikers end for no apparent reason
Sohail Tanvir to Gayle, 1 run, good length at middle, flicks it to mid-on
Narine to Gayle, FOUR, drops it short down the leg and he has literally hit a one-handed backhand to dispatch this behind square
Narine to Gayle, no run, good length at off stump, draws him forward and beats him on the outside edge

Narine to Gayle, OUT, tossed up at middle stump, slightly back of a good length, no feet from Gayle, goes with his hands and his reach can't help him get under this before it turns. Top edge is the result and Akmal pouches it at long-off
Wicket: ['CH Gayle c Umar Akmal b Narine 5 (7b 1x4 0x6) SR: 71.42']

Commentary: Narine to Babar Azam, 1 run, good length, fired at middle stump, punched to long-on off the back foot

Narine to Sangakkara, FOUR, drops it short and turns it away from off stump, Sanga hangs back and punches this with great placement through the covers. Roy chases and tries to pull it back in but it's caught the rope and third umpire will deem that a boundary
Narine to Sangakkara, no run, good length on off, drives on the up and slightly in the air, straight to cover
Sohail Tanvir to Babar Azam, no run, back of a length at off, punched towards mid-off, but extra cover puts in a dive to cut it halfway
Sohail Tanvir to Babar Azam, no run, good length, angled across from off stump, outside half of the bat as he tries to drive on the up, straight to cover

Sohail Tanvir to Babar Azam, FOUR, back of a length outside off, angled across, but he plays a peculiar shot. Gets in position for a back foot punch and lifts it over mid-on. You need great eyes to pull that off. Good shot.
Sohail Tanvir to Babar Azam, 1 run, back of a length angled across of, mistimes his pull shot and mid-on cuts it off
Sohail Tanvir to Sangakkara, 1 run, good length outside off, pushed to cover off the front foot
Sohail Tanvir to Babar Azam, 1 run, slower ball, good length at off stump, walks across and flicks it to short fine
Mohammad Irfan to Babar Azam, 1 run, back of a length, angled in at off stump, inside edge onto the pad and into the leg side
Mohammad Irfan to Sangakkara, no run, good length at middle stump, drives it on the up across the angle, straight to mid-on
Mohammad Irfan to Sangakkara, no run, back of a length, angled across the batsman who pokes at it off the back foot, straight to point
Mohammad Irfan to Sangakkara, no run, back of a length, angled across, chopped with no timing to point
Mohammad Irfan to Sangakkara, 1 run, good length on middle, angled across, jumps out and slaps it to mid-off who fumbles

Mohammad Irfan to Babar Azam, OUT, short and wide, throws his hands at it, gets an outside edge and it carries straight to third man. He didn't have to move an inch. All hands from Babar, and hard ones at that.
Bilawal Bhatti to Sangakkara, 1 run, back of a length in the corridor, pushed to mid-off's right off the back foot
Wicket: ['Babar Azam c Bilawal Bhatti b Mohammad Irfan 9 (10b 1x4 0x6) SR: 90.00']

Commentary: Bilawal Bhatti to Shoaib Malik, 2 runs, back of length at middle, gets on his toes and places it gracefully in front of square
Bilawal Bhatti to Shoaib Malik, no run, back of a length outside off, bunted off the back foot to short extra cover

Bilawal Bhatti to Shoaib Malik, 2 runs, back of a length outside off, drives on the up as it gets big on him and it catches the finger of Yasir Shah at point as he dives. Has to go down as a drop...but not without making us feel bad first
Bilawal Bhatti to Shoaib Malik, 1 run, good length at off stump, thick inside edge on his attempted drive and it goes to mid-on who fires it in and might have caused some problems there if he had hit
Bilawal Bhatti to Sangakkara, 1 run, back of a length on the hips, glanced to deep square
Mohammad Irfan to Sangakkara, 2 runs, good length at middle, steps out and tries to cream this over the off side, but has no timing on it and just slices it over the infield
Mohammad Irfan to Shoaib Malik, 1 run, into the blockhole at off stump, and he can only dig it out to long-off
Mohammad Irfan to Sangakkara, FOUR, brings fine leg in and bowls short at chest height, so Sangakkara teaches him what not to do by pulling away four easy runs
Mohammad Irfan to Sangakkara, no run, back of a length outside off, goes for the pull, no timing, straight to mid-on on the bounce
Mohammad Irfan to Sangakkara, FOUR, full on the pads, clears the front foot and plays an ugly slog behind square for some pretty runs
Mohammad Irfan to Sangakkara, FOUR, good length on the pads, waits for it and pushes it past short fine's dive to the right
Yasir Shah to Shoaib Malik, no run, back of a length at off stump, hurries him and he just about chops it to point
Yasir Shah to Shoaib Malik, 2 runs, steps out, meets it on the full on middle stump and drills it past Sanga, long-on runs in and puts in a dive to save the boundary
Yasir Shah to Shoaib Malik, 1 leg bye, good length outside off, steps out, quickly realises he's not at the pitch and offers his pad. Catches him on it and bobs into the leg side
Yasir Shah to Sangakkara, 1 run, good length on off stump, turns in as he goes back and pushes it to deep midwicket
Yasir Shah to Shoaib Malik, 1 run, good length at middle stump, turned into the leg side off the front foot
Yasir Shah to Sangakkara, 1 run, tossed up on middle, goes forward and uses his wrists to flick it to deep midwicket
Narine to Sangakkara, 1 run, back of a length at middle, turns away from him and he has to really watch it closely as he pulls it to deep midwicket
Narine to Shoaib Malik, no run, good length outside off, turns away from him as he goes back and pokes at it
Narine to Shoaib Malik, 1 run, attempted faster one, picks it and goes back to pull, deep square gets across
Narine to Sangakkara, no run, tossed up outside off, expands his stance to try and lift it over the off side, beaten outside the off. Appeal for stumping, not out.
Narine to Sangakkara, no run, good length outside off, walks across and goes for the slog sweep, beaten again as it climbs on him
Narine to Sangakkara, 1 run, good length at middle, goes back and pushes to deep midwicket
Elliott to Sangakkara, 1 run, good length at off stump from around the wicket, turned into the leg side
Elliott to Shoaib Malik, 1 run, rolls his fingers, good length outside off, punched to long-on
Elliott to Sangakkara, 1 run, good length at off stump, flicked to deep midwicket
Elliott to Shoaib Malik, 1 run, short and not wide enough for the cut, even though he goes for it and hits it one bounce to point
Elliott to Sangakkara, 1 run, back of a length on leg stump, backs away and connects the pull straight to deep square
Elliott to Shoaib Malik, 1 run, full at off stump, clears his foot and drills it back, Elliott gets low and gets some part of his body on it, or maybe boot, but it deviates into the midwicket region
Bilawal Bhatti to Shoaib Malik, 2 runs, short and wide, middles his cut to perfection but Elliott has done brilliantly at sweeper to runs across and slide to save the boundary
Bilawal Bhatti to Shoaib Malik, 1 run, back of a length outside off, punched to long-on off the back foot
Bilawal Bhatti to Sangakkara, FOUR, short and wide, sits up for him and he blazes this through midwicket with a pull shot
Bilawal Bhatti to Sangakkara, FOUR, full on the pads, midwicket is in and he lifts it ease to pick up some easy runs. Poor bowling
Bilawal Bhatti to Sangakkara, no run, full outside off, expansive drive straight to mid-off
Bilawal Bhatti to Sangakkara, 1 run, full on the pads, looks to tuck this behind short fine leg, gets a leading edge....and it lands safely in front of long-on

Narine to Sangakkara, 2 runs, drops it short outside ff, Sanga bounces back and punches behind square. Sweeper gets across quickly, puts in a dive and puts in a great throw right next to the stumps...the bails are off and it's been reviewed...not out. Just in
Narine to Sangakkara, 1 run, dropped short at middle stump, pulled to deep midwicket
Narine to Shoaib Malik, 2 runs, back of a length outside off, goes deep and slices it between short third man and point
Narine to Shoaib Malik, 1 run, good length at off stump, dabbed with soft hands towards point
Narine to Sangakkara, 2 runs, drops it short, Sanga has gone too far across and has to reach out. Connects nicely nevertheless and sweeper is in action once again
Narine to Sangakkara, FOUR, good length at middle stump, makes room and goes over cover. Hasn't middled it and sweeper just about misses as he tries to run across and slap it back into play
Elliott to Shoaib Malik, SIX, full on off stump, gets under it and puts in a nice bat swing, but gets it low on the bat. It carries over long-on anyway
Elliott to Shoaib Malik, 1 run, back of a length at off stump, backs away and pulls. This time he connects, but it's straight to deep midwicket
Elliott to Sangakkara, 1 run, good length at middle stump, makes room, is followed, but slaps it into the leg side to long-on's left
Elliott to Shoaib Malik, SIX, ooooooh! Slower ball floated at leg stump, he gets low and slog-sweeps this wayyyyyy over deep midwicket and it's out of the stadium
Elliott to Shoaib Malik, 1 run, full outside off, outside edge, onto the keeper's pad and straight to point
Elliott to Sangakkara, 1 run, full at middle stump, flicks it to long-on and brings up his half-century
Yasir Shah to Sangakkara, no run, good length, pushed flat at middle and hurries Sanga who just gets his bat down in time to flick it into the leg side
Yasir Shah to Sangakkara, FOUR, short of good length outside off, backs away and slaps it aerially to sweeper cover's left
Yasir Shah to Sangakkara, SIX, huge! Tossed up outside off, gets on one knee and slams a slog sweep with all the grace that we've seen over the years, has that hit the roof? Looks like it.
Yasir Shah to Sangakkara, 1 run, fires in a faster one, drops it short, pulls it past midwicket but there's a deep fielder there to cut it off
Yasir Shah to Shoaib Malik, 2 runs, he's not tossing it up anymore. Pushed flat and short into the pads, punched between long-on and deep midwicket
Yasir Shah to Shoaib Malik, no run, back of a length at off stump, punched off the back foot to point
Mohammad Irfan to Sangakkara, 2 runs, fires in a well-directed yorker but Sanga is in full control and he clips it off his toes behind square
Mohammad Irfan to Sangakkara, 1 run, good length, angled across off stump, pushed into the midwicket region off his front foot
Mohammad Irfan to Shoaib Malik, 1 run, low full toss at off stump, punched to long-on
Mohammad Irfan to Sangakkara, 1 run, short and wide, clobbered on the up but straight to sweeper cover
Mohammad Irfan to Shoaib Malik, 1 run, low full toss at middle, punched down to long-on
Mohammad Irfan to Sangakkara, no run, back of a length outside off, backs away to try and cut this away, but he's beaten on the inside edge
Sohail Tanvir to Shoaib Malik, 1 run, short outside off, he gets this so sweetly as he pulls it, but it's straight to deep midwicket. Cricket isn't always rewarding
Sohail Tanvir to Sangakkara, no run, full outside off, goes for the drive, jams it out to point
Sohail Tanvir to Sangakkara, no run, full outside off, slower ball this time, the keeper fumbles after Sanga is beaten

Sohail Tanvir to Sangakkara, OUT, gets one at the stump and hits them! Good length, coming into Sanga this time and he walks at it and plays a dirty heave. Sneaks between bat and pad and smashes the stumps
Sohail Tanvir to Pollard, 1 run, almost gone first ball! Good length outside off, pushes to covers and takes off, direct hit and he'd be gone! Roy couldn't hit with a diving underarm throw
Sohail Tanvir to Shoaib Malik, 1 run, back of a length on off stump, flicked to deep square
Bilawal Bhatti to Shoaib Malik, no run, back of a length outside off, pushed straight to point

Bilawal Bhatti to Shoaib Malik, OUT, Oh dear, this is awful from Malik. Good length outside off, his head is looking upwards, his feet haven't moved, his bat is looking to send it over midwicket, but his eyes eventually see it being pouched by Tanvir at third man
Bilawal Bhatti to Bopara, no run, back of a length outside off, defended off the back foot
Bilawal Bhatti to Bopara, 1 run, back of a length outside off, short arm jab down to long-on
Bilawal Bhatti to Pollard, FOUR, what a shot! Back of a length outside off, it's climbing, but he has the height. It's fast, but he has the power - punches it over mid-off and it goes one bounce
Bilawal Bhatti to Pollard, 1 leg bye, back of a length and catches him on the thigh guard. It trickles down in front of point
Narine to Pollard, 1 run, good length outside off, pokes it to short third and gets to the other end
Narine to Bopara, 1 run, short and wide, slapped to deep cover
Narine to Pollard, 2 runs, short and wide, cut hard behind square, deep cover runs to his left and cuts it off

Narine to Pollard, OUT, got him! Bowls four legspinners and brings this one back to bamboozle the big man. Superb bowling. Tosses it up outside off, Pollard wants to push this with the spin off the front foot, but the ball sneaks through between bat and pad
Narine to Imad Wasim, 1 run, good length, spinning away from outside off, slashed to deep cover
Narine to Bopara, 1 run, full outside off, driven to sweeper cover
Bilawal Bhatti to Bopara, no run, back of a length, comes in and goes under his attempted slog, just above the stumps
Bilawal Bhatti to Bopara, 1 run, full outside off, wild heave at it, inside half of the bat, straight to deep midwicket
Bilawal Bhatti to Imad Wasim, no run, full at middle stump, tries to whip this into the leg side, inside edge onto pad and it lands in front of the bowler
Bilawal Bhatti to Imad Wasim, 1 run, full outside off, expansive drive, but it hits the bottom and bobbles harmlessly towards extra cover
Bilawal Bhatti to Bopara, 1 run, back of a length outside off, goes for the big pull shot, gets it at the toe and and it flies towards Sohail Tanvir and lands in front of him
Bilawal Bhatti to Imad Wasim, FOUR, length ball angled across the left hander, clears the front foot and slams it to mid-off's left

Sohail Tanvir to Bopara, OUT, slower ball, back of a length outside off, goes for the pull, catches it on the hips and it rolls to the keeper. They've tried to sneak in a single, but the keeper gets a direct hit and there's no need for a review
Sohail Tanvir to Sohail Khan, SIX, clubbed! length ball on the pads, he hangs back and gets it right off the middle as he lifts it over deep square
Sohail Tanvir to Sohail Khan, 2 runs, yorker at middle, jams it out to long-on's right and the fielder has to scramble quickly to cut it off
Sohail Tanvir to Sohail Khan, 1 run, yorker outside off, carved to covers who has a shy and misses by a mile, but there's no chance of a second
Sohail Tanvir to Bopara, OUT, full on the pads, not the best of deliveries, but he's lift this with the angle and straight to deep square. He'll be thinking he could've put that away for runs.
Sohail Tanvir to Mohammad Amir, SIX, Tanvir bowls another bad ball, and this time he's punished. Length ball at middle stump, lifted on the up easily over his head
Mohammad Irfan to Sohail Khan, 1 run, thigh-high full toss, can only turn it to deep square leg. Wants a free-hit for this, but it wasn't high enough
Mohammad Irfan to Mohammad Amir, no run, in the blockhole outside off, Amir can't do anything at this and it's just a token swipe at it as he's beaten
Mohammad Irfan to Mohammad Amir, FOUR, another yorker outside off, clears the front leg, slices it between point and short third man
Mohammad Irfan to Mohammad Amir, 1 run, yorker outside off, jams it straight to cover

Mohammad Irfan to Sohail Khan, OUT, but it's all normalcy for us! Does what he's supposed to. Full, fast, straight. Timber. Goes under Sohail's slog and sounds sweet - depending on if you're a bowler or not - as it strikes the stumps
Wicket: ['RS Bopara c Bilawal Bhatti b Sohail Tanvir 5 (9b 0x4 0x6) SR: 55.55']

Commentary: Mohammad Irfan to Usama Mir, FOUR, low full toss outside off, gets low and lifts it classily over the infield and it crosses the boundary on the bounce...and that's it. They fall short by seven runs. Great over by Irfan Jr.
